3: Hey, take a look at that...
Is that a frame for real? It's so beautiful...
The Support Force mentioned that the frame would be a little lavish when they delivered it. I thought they were just joking...
Even though the appearance of the frame is a little too excessive, the gain in benefits is also significant.
In terms of combat, the new frame allows for tactical positioning through satellite geolocation. Plus, I can move and shoot in the same way Lee does with the new tactical mode.

2: I also think that you've become much stronger, Liv.
4: But don't go dashing to the frontline immediately, Liv.

3: I'm glad you think so, Commandant.
That was... an accident. I was still familiarizing myself with the new frame, you see—I'll pay more attention next time...
There will be more members joining us in the future, Commandant. I want to be a role model worthy of their respect and someone they can learn from...
That's why I'm glad to equip this advanced frame.
Do you think it's possible for me to use another frame on non-combat missions in the future, Commandant?
It's kind of embarrassing how everyone keeps staring at me...
